content.text: Hi, I'm doing well! How about you?
I'm good, thanks. I'm a pretty simple guy, but I'm loyal to my friends and family. I like to shoot a bow and I prefer to live where the weather is cold.
That's cool! I like to stay fit and I'm trying to eat healthier, but my boyfriend loves fast food. I own a small farm where I herd cattle, but I want to show my siblings how to rollerblade.
That's awesome! I'm a real estate agent and I wait tables on the weekends. I'm learning to shoot a bow, but I'm not very good at it yet.
That's cool! I love real estate. I'm glad you're trying to learn to shoot a bow. It's a lot of fun.
Thanks! I'm trying to get better at it.
You're welcome! I'm sure you'll get better with practice.
